segments.text: You want to argue your ticket today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . That is why I'm here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I was pulled over for allegedly speeding .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are you sure you weren't speeding ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: To be honest , I really wasn't .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I was under the speed limit . I was going 35 , when the speed limit was 40 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm just going to let you go , since the arresting officer isn't here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What about my ticket ? Do I still need to pay ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm so glad for your help .
segments.speaker: S2
